name: preset-env-modules
description: Demonstrate Babel Preset Env with ESModules Support.
author: Kristofer Baxter

scripts.start: yarn test; cp server.js dist/server.js; node server.js
scripts.test: rm -rf dist/*; BABEL_ENV=esmodules yarn babel input.js -o dist/output-modules.js; BABEL_ENV=nomodules yarn babel input.js -o dist/output-nomodules.js
